// LC-B2C-AD(Foundation)-CM-WL
(function() {
  // ifdef def pragma
  if(window._ptk_media_track_registered) return;
  window._ptk_media_track_registered = true;
  
  // default queue
  window._ptk_queue = window._ptk_queue || [];
  window.ptk_media_track_register = window.ptk_media_track_register 
    || (function(tracker){ window._ptk_queue.push(tracker) });
    
  // utilities
  var current_root_domain = /(\w+\.\w+)$/.exec(location.hostname)[1];
  var utils = {
    s_parse: function(sep,pattern,decodingFn,base) {
      return base.split(sep).reduce(function(g,t){
        var mt = pattern.exec(t);
        if(mt) {
          try { g[mt.groups.key] = decodingFn(mt.groups.val) }
          catch(e){ g[mt.groups.key] = mt.groups.val }
        }
        return g;
      }, {});
    },
    build_url: function(loc, params) {
      var ret = loc;
      if(params && 0<Object.keys(params).length) {
        ret += loc.includes('?') ? '&' : '?';
        ret += Object.keys(params)
          .map(function (k){ 
            return k + '=' + (params[k]!=null ? encodeURIComponent(params[k]) : '');
          })
          .join('&');
      }
      return ret
    },
    element: function(tagname, attributes) {
      return Object.assign(document.createElement(tagname), attributes)
    },
    has_imported: function(url) { 
      return document.querySelector('script[src*="'+url+'"]') != null; 
    },
    integer: function(text) { return parseInt(text.replace(/[^\d]+/g, '')) },
    number: function(text) { return parseFloat(text.replace(/[^\d\.]/g, '')) },
    dom_text: function(selector, anchor) {
      var el = (anchor || document).querySelector(selector);
      return el ? el.textContent.trim() : null;
    },
    dom_attr: function (attr_key, selector, anchor) {
      var el = (anchor || document).querySelector(selector);
      return el ? el[attr_key] : null;
    },
    dom_data: function(data_key, selector, anchor) {
      var el = (anchor || document).querySelector(selector);
      return el ? el.dataset[data_key] : null;
    },
    dom_input: function(options, anchor, inputType){
      var selector = (inputType || 'input')
        + Object.keys(options).map(function(ok) {
          return '['+ok+'="'+options[ok]+'"]'
        }).join('');
      var el = (anchor || document).querySelector(selector);
      return el ? el.value : null;
    },
    set_cookie: function(key, value, expiration, domain, path) {
      if(ptk.cookies) { ptk.cookies[key] = value; }
      return (document.cookie = key + '=' + value 
        + ';max-age=' + (expiration || 900)
        + ';domain=' + (domain || current_root_domain ||'.samsung.com')
        + ';path=' + (path || '/'));
    },
    assign_utms: function (campaign, source, medium, content, term) {
      var utms = {};
      if (!utms) utms = {};
      // required
      utms.campaign = utms.campaign || campaign;
      utms.source = source;
      utms.medium = medium;
      // optional
      if (content) utms.content = content;
      if (term) utms.term = term;
      return utms;
    },
  };
  utils.imports = (function(url, onload, anchor) {
    var the_script = utils.element('script', {src: url, async: true});
    if(onload) { the_script.addEventListener('load', onload) }
    return (anchor || window.document.head || window.document).appendChild(the_script);
  });
  utils.send_pixel = (function(location, params, tagname, via) {
    var urls = utils.build_url(location, params);
    if(via && document.querySelector(via)) {
      document.querySelector(via).src = urls;
      return via;
    } else {
      var attrs = {src: urls};
      tagname = tagname || 'img';
      if(tagname == 'script') { attrs.async = true; }
      var el = utils.element(tagname, attrs)
      document.body.appendChild(el);
      return el;
    }
  })
  utils.gpath = (function(prefix) {
    var utm_keys = ['campaign', 'source', 'medium', 'content', 'term'];
    var utms;
    var __searches = utils.s_parse(/[\?&]/g, /^(?<key>.+)(=(?<val>.*)?)$/, function(v){ return v!=null ? decodeURIComponent(v) : null }, location.search);
    //var category = digitalData.page.pageInfo.pageName.replaceAll('\:','_');

    // url에 utm 있을 시
    if (__searches.utm_campaign) {
      utms = utm_keys.reduce(function (gg, uk) {
        if (__searches['utm_' + uk]) gg[uk] = __searches['utm_' + uk];
        return gg;
      }, {});
    }
     // url에 cid 있을 시
     else if (__searches.cid && typeof (__searches.cid) == 'string') {
       var ctoks = __searches.cid.split('_');
       if (9 <= ctoks.length) {
         utms = utils.assign_utms(ctoks[4], ctoks[3], ctoks[6], ctoks[8], 10 <= ctoks.length ? ctoks[9] : null);
       }
     }
    var the_path = '/' + (prefix || '') + (!prefix && utms ? '?' + utm_keys.filter(function(k) {utms[k]}).map(function(k) {'utm_' + k + '=' + utms[k]}).join('&') : '');
    return the_path;
  });

  

  var events = {
    register: 'ptk.mediatrack.register',
    domready: 'ptk.mediatrack.domready',
    rendered: 'ptk.mediatrack.rendered',
    index: 'ptk.mediatrack.index',
    category: 'ptk.mediatrack.category',
    product: 'ptk.mediatrack.product',
    search: 'ptk.mediatrack.search',
    view_cart: 'ptk.mediatrack.cart',
    cartadd: 'ptk.mediatrack.cartadd',
    favorite: 'ptk.mediatrack.favorite',
    checkout: 'ptk.mediatrack.checkout',
    order: 'ptk.mediatrack.order',
    purchase: 'ptk.mediatrack.purchase',
    refund: 'ptk.mediatrack.refund',
    // campaign
    campaign: 'ptk.mediatrack.campaign',
    campaign_popup: 'ptk.mediatrack.campaign.popup',
    campaign_popup_submit: 'ptk.mediatrack.campaign.popup.submit',
  };

  var media_registered = {};
  

  // send pre-registered alert
  var dispatch_mediatrack = function(ev_name, params) {
    var ev = Object.assign(new Event(events[ev_name]), params || {});
    if(ev.items || ev.item) { // items exists 
      var items = ev.items || [ev.item] || [];
    } 

    window._ptk_queue.push({event: ev_name, params: params});
    return window.dispatchEvent(ev);
  }
  var ptk = {
    utils: utils,
    events: events,
    cookies: utils.s_parse(/;\s*/g, /^(?<key>.+)(=(?<val>.*)?)$/, JSON.parse, document.cookie),
    searches: utils.s_parse(/[\?&]/g, /^(?<key>.+)(=(?<val>.*)?)$/, function(v){ return v!=null ? decodeURIComponent(v) : null }, location.search),
    domain: current_root_domain,
  }
  

  ptk.listen = (function(event, callback) {
    document.__eventlog = document.__eventlog || [];
    document.addEventListener(event, callback.bind(ptk));
    // resolve previous events
    document.__eventlog
      .filter(function(ev) { return ev.type == event })
      .forEach(function(ev) { return (callback.bind(ptk))(ev) });
  });
  window._ptk_listen = ptk.listen;

  ptk.emit = (function(event, params){
    document.__eventlog = document.__eventlog || [];
    var ev = Object.assign(new Event(event), params || {});
    document.dispatchEvent(ev);
    document.__eventlog.push(ev);
  });


  // run others
  var register_the_tracker = function(tracker) {
    Object.keys(tracker).filter(function(ev_key){ return events[ev_key] })
      .forEach(function(ev_key) {
        window.addEventListener(events[ev_key], (tracker[ev_key].bind(ptk)));
      });
  }



  // register prev trackers
  window._ptk_queue.filter(function(tracker) { return tracker.media })
    .forEach(function(tracker){ register_the_tracker(tracker) });
  // dispatch registration
  dispatch_mediatrack('register');

  // method overloading
  window.ptk_media_track_register = (function(tracker) {
    
    if(media_registered[tracker.media]) { return; }

    window._ptk_queue.push(tracker);
    media_registered[tracker.media] = tracker;

    // register event listener
    register_the_tracker(tracker);

    // forced run pre-triggered events
    var events_done = window._ptk_queue.filter(function(pq) { return pq.event });
    // sequencial run
    for(var i=0; i<events_done.length; i++) {
      var ev = events_done[i];
      if(tracker[ev.event]) {
        ((tracker[ev.event]).bind(ptk))(ev.params);
      }
    }
  }).bind(ptk);

  // default parser
  var dispatch_on_location = function(path_pattern, ev_name, paramsFn) {
    if(path_pattern.test(window.location.pathname)) {
      dispatch_mediatrack(ev_name, paramsFn ? paramsFn() : undefined);
    }
  }
  var scrap_itemlist_data = function(cell_selector) {
    var rets = [];
    document.querySelectorAll(cell_selector).forEach(function(cell){
      rets.push({
        id: utils.dom_text('[class$="-spec"] [class$="-label"]', cell),
        name: utils.dom_text('[class$="-spec"] [class$="-title"]', cell).replace(/\s+/g, ' '),
        quantity: utils.integer(utils.dom_input({name: 'buyQty', type: 'hidden'}, cell)),
        price: utils.integer(utils.dom_input({name: 'goodsBuyPrc', type: 'hidden'}, cell)),
        pays: utils.integer(utils.dom_input({name: 'prmtDcPrc', type: 'hidden'}), cell),
      })
    });
    return rets;
  };
  window.ptk_media_track_register({
    media: true, // common event
    // parse location to emit search (location-only-based event) 
    register: function() {
      // index
      dispatch_on_location(/^\/sec\/?$/i, 'index');
      
      // google GMC ownership
      document.head.appendChild(utils.element('meta', {
        name: 'google-site-verification',
        content: 'ubZUMGdO5kqysMFucOOpkH_T3XIP4abfWJ_8_J7au8I',
      }));
    },
    // parse document elements to emit; order, purchase, refund.
    //  and appending events (cartadd, favorite)
    domready: function() {
      // cart page
      dispatch_on_location(/\/sec\/cart/i, 'view_cart', function() {                                                                                                                                                
        return {items: scrap_itemlist_data('.cart-area .cart-tbl')};
      })

      // begin checkout
      dispatch_on_location(/\/sec\/order\/?$/i, 'checkout', function() {
        // begin checkout
        var payline = document.querySelector('.payment-area');
        var order_items = scrap_itemlist_data('.order-area .buy-target-goods');

        var orderinfo = {
          items: order_items,
          revenue: order_items.reduce(function(n,it){ return n + it.pays }, 0),
          membership: utils.integer(utils.dom_input({id: 'order_payment_total_additional_point_amt'}), payline),
        }

        // order checkout listener
        document.querySelector('button[onclick*="orderPaymentManager.btnStartPay()"]')
          .addEventListener('click', function() {
            dispatch_mediatrack('order', Object.assign({
              options: {
                payment: utils.dom_text('.pay-nav-box .on[data-paymeans-target]'),
              }
            }, orderinfo));
          });
        // save session storage this
        window.sessionStorage.setItem('.order', JSON.stringify(orderinfo));
        // return
        return orderinfo;
      });
      
      // purchase complete
      dispatch_on_location(/^\/sec\/order\/\w*ordercomplet\w+\/?$/i, 'purchase', function(){
        var orderinfo;
        try { orderinfo = JSON.parse(window.sessionStorage.getItem('.order')) } 
        catch(e){ orderinfo = {items: []} }
        var items = [];
        document.querySelectorAll('.order-detail-type1 > div').forEach(function(cell){
          items.push({
            id: utils.dom_text('.order-itmName *:nth-child(2)', cell),
            name: utils.dom_text('.order-itmName *:nth-child(1)', cell).replace(/\s+/, ' '),
            quantity: utils.integer(utils.dom_text('.order-itmCount', cell)),
            price: utils.integer(utils.dom_text('.order-itmPrice', cell)),
          });
        });
        
        return Object.assign({
          order_id: utils.dom_text('.order-code'),
          revenue: parseInt(utils.dom_input({id: 'totPayAmt'})),
          items: items,
        }, orderinfo);
      });
    },
    // append event listeners to emit; ajax-ready(category, product)
    rendered: function() {
      
      // search
      dispatch_on_location(/\/search\/searchresult\//i, 'search', function(){
        var search_results = document.querySelector('.result-article');
        var items = [];
        search_results.querySelectorAll('li.item:not(.item-best-match)')
          .forEach(function(cell){
            var code = utils.dom_text('.desc', cell);
            if(!code) return;
            items.push({
              id: code,
              name: utils.dom_text('.name', cell),
          });
        });
        return {
          queries: ptk.searches.keyword.split(/\s+/g),
          items: items,
        };
      });

      // cancelRefund
      if(/\/order\/\w*CancelRequest\w*\/?$/i.test(window.location.pathname)) {
        var cancel_form = document.querySelector('form#cancel_request_list_form');
        var cancel_info = {
          order_id: utils.dom_input({name: 'ordNo', type:'hidden'}, cancel_form),
        }
        document.querySelector('#commonConfirmOkBtn')
          .addEventListener('click', function() {
            dispatch_mediatrack('refund', cancel_info);
        });
      }

      switch(digitalData.page.pageInfo.pageTrack) {
        case 'product finder':
          // PF: category (PCD 및 여타 카테고리 제외)
          (function() {
            var path_tokens = digitalData.page.pageInfo.pageName.split(':');
            var items = [];
            document.querySelectorAll('.list-product li.item')
              .forEach(function(cell) {
              var itemdata = {
                id: utils.dom_text('.prd-num', cell),
                name: utils.dom_text('.prd-name', cell),
              };
              items.push(itemdata);
              // add favorite
              var fav_btn = cell.querySelector('.btn-good');
              if(fav_btn) {
                fav_btn.addEventListener('click', function(ev) {
                  if(!ev.target.classList.contains('on')) {
                    dispatch_mediatrack('favorite', {item: itemdata});
                  }
                });
              }
            });
            dispatch_mediatrack('category', {
              category_id: path_tokens[1]+':'+path_tokens[2],
              category_name: digitalData.page.pageInfo.pageName,
              items: items,
            });
          })(); break;

        case 'product detail':
          (function() {
            var iteminfo_line = document.querySelector('.itm-information');
            var iteminfo = {
              id: digitalData.product.model_code,
              name: digitalData.product.displayName,
              brand: digitalData.product.pd_sub_type,
              category: digitalData.product.pvi_type_name + ':' + digitalData.product.pvi_subtype_name,
              price: utils.integer(utils.dom_data('price', '.itm-price .event-price [data-price]', iteminfo_line)
                || utils.dom_input({name:'originalPrice',type:'hidden'}, iteminfo_line) || ''),
            };
            dispatch_mediatrack('product', {item: iteminfo});
            // add to cart
            var btn_cartadd = document.querySelector('#btnCart');
            var btn_favorite = iteminfo_line.querySelector('button.btn-good');
            if(btn_cartadd) {
              btn_cartadd.addEventListener('click', function() {
                dispatch_mediatrack('cartadd', {item: iteminfo});
              });
            }
            // add favorite
            if(btn_favorite) {
              btn_favorite.addEventListener('click', function(ev) {
                if(!ev.target.classList.contains('on')) {
                  dispatch_mediatrack('favorite', {item: iteminfo});
                }
              });
            }
          })(); break;
        default: 
          break;
      }
      // eventLayer 
      //dialog ajax call
        var match = /^\/?(.+)?\/$/.exec(window.location.pathname);
        var pathname = match ? match[1] : digitalData.page.pageInfo.pageName.replace(/\:/g, '_');
        var category = pathname.replace(/\//g, '_');
        var eventCode;
        dispatch_mediatrack('campaign', { category: category });

        // 팝업 버튼 (fnCallPop2 관련 버튼이 있을 때)
        var popupButtons = document.querySelectorAll('[onclick*="fnCallPop2"]');
        if(0<popupButtons.length) {
          // ajax 설정 덮어쓰기
          setInterval(function() {
            // no jquery has set
            if (!$ || !$.ajaxSettings || !$.ajaxSetup) { return; }
            else if (!$.ajaxSettings.ptk__) { 
              $.ajaxSetup({
                ptk__: true,
                success: function (resp) {
                  ptk.emit('ajax', {data: resp});
                  if (eventCode && resp.eventInfo && !resp.eventInfo.errMsg) {
                    var loginChecker = document.querySelector('input[name="useLogin"]');
                    if (loginChecker) {
                      dispatch_mediatrack('campaign_popup', {
                        category: category,
                        code: eventCode,
                        resp: resp,
                        status: 'success',
                      });
                      ptk.emit('ajax_popup', {
                        code: eventCode,
                        resp: resp,
                        status: 'success',
                      });
                    }
                  }
                  else if (eventCode && resp.result && resp.result.resultCd === 'success') {
                    dispatch_mediatrack('campaign_popup_submit', {
                      category: category,
                      code: eventCode,
                      resp: resp,
                      status: 'success',
                    });
                    ptk.emit('ajax_popup_submit', {
                      code: eventCode,
                      resp: resp,
                      status: 'success',
                    });
                  }
                }
              });
            }
          }, 500);
          // 클릭 이벤트 리스너 등록
          popupButtons.forEach(function(btn) {
            btn.addEventListener('click', function (ev) {
              var btn_event_code_match = /fnCallPop2\s*\(\s*(?<evcode>\d+)\s*\)/.exec(ev.target.getAttribute('onclick'));
              if (btn_event_code_match) {
                eventCode = btn_event_code_match.groups.evcode;
              }
            });
          });
        }

    },
  })

  
  var events_prefetched = [];
  document.addEventListener('readystatechange', function() {
    if(document.readyState=='interactive') return dispatch_mediatrack('domready');
    if(document.readyState=='complete') return dispatch_mediatrack('rendered');
  });
  switch(document.readyState) {
    case 'complete':
      events_prefetched.push('rendered');
    case 'interactive':
      events_prefetched.push('domready');
    default: break;
  }
  events_prefetched.reverse().forEach(function(ep) { dispatch_mediatrack(ep) });
  
})();

(function() {
  var media_name = 'widerplanet_nhnad2';
  var media_track_id = '50486';

  /* utilizes */
  var track = function(options) {
    window.wptg_tagscript_vars.push(function() { 
      var rv = Object.assign({
          wp_hcuid: '',
          ti: media_track_id,
          ty: 'Home',
          device: 'web',
      }, options || {}); 
      return rv;
    });
  };

  var map_items = function(items) {
    return items.map(function(it) { 
      var ret = {i: it.id, t: it.name};
      if(it.quantity) {ret.q = it.quantity}
      if(it.price){ret.p = it.price}
      return ret;
    });
  }

  // initialize
  window._ptk_queue = window._ptk_queue || [];
  window.ptk_media_track_register = window.ptk_media_track_register 
    || (function(tracker){ window._ptk_queue.push(tracker) });

  // registration
  window.ptk_media_track_register({
    media: media_name,
    register: function(){
      window.wptg_tagscript_vars = window.wptg_tagscript_vars || [];
      track();
    },
    product: function(ev){
      track({
        ty: 'Item',
        items: map_items([ev.item]),
      });
    },
    view_cart: function(ev){
      track({
        ty: 'Cart',
        items: map_items(ev.items),
      });
    },
    purchase: function(ev){
      track({
        ty: 'PurchaseComplete',
        items: map_items(ev.items),
      });
    },
  })
})();
});</script><script>_satellite["_runScript19"](function(event, target, Promise) {

        send_to: to,
        // value: ev.revenue,
        // transaction_id: ev.order_id,
        currency: 'KRW',
      };
      if(ev) {
        if(ev.revenue) { options.value = ev.revenue; }

(function() {
    var media_name = 'cookieoven';
    var media_track_id = '8H5XtkvGcrxbSn13sGG2XnX7';
    var media_cookie_dict = {
      click_key: 'ckoven_key',
      advertiser_token: 'ckoven_token',
    };
    var media_search_dict = Object.keys(media_cookie_dict)  // media_cookie_dict 의 key , value 반대로
      .reduce(function(gg, ck){
        gg[media_cookie_dict[ck]] = ck;
        return gg;
    }, {});
  // registration
  window.ptk_media_track_register({
    media: media_name,
    register: function(){
      if(this.searches.click_key) {
        this.utils.set_cookie(media_cookie_dict.click_key, this.searches.click_key);
        this.utils.set_cookie(media_cookie_dict.advertiser_token, media_track_id);
      } 
      else if(this.cookies[media_cookie_dict.click_key]) {
        // overwrite for next
        Object.values(media_search_dict)
          .filter((function(ck){return this.cookies[ck]}).bind(this))
          .forEach((function(ck) {return this.utils.set_cookie(ck, this.cookies[ck])}).bind(this));
      } else {
        return;
      }
    },
    domready: function() {
      if(this.cookies[media_cookie_dict.click_key]){
        if(/www.samsung.com/i.test(location.hostname)) {
          var lns = document.querySelectorAll('a[href*="samsungebiz.com"]');
          // if (lns.search == /^\?/) 
          lns.forEach(function (ln) {
            ln.search = (ln.search || '')
                + ((/^\?/.test(ln.search)) ? '&' : '?')
                +  Object.keys(media_search_dict) // [ckoven_key', 'ckoven_token', ...]
                .map(function (ok) {
                  return media_search_dict[ok]+'='+encodeURIComponent(this.cookies[ok] || this.searches[media_search_dict[ok]]);
              }).join('&');
          });
        }
      } 
    },
  })
})();

          height: 0,

          .join('|'),

        // location
        media_track_endpoint+'/cart/add',

    // },

        goodscode: ev.items.map(function(item) { return item.id }).join('|'),
        prodcnt: ev.items.map(function(item) { return item.quantity.toString() }).join('|'),
        price: ev.items.map(function(item) { return item.price.toString() }).join('|'),
      };
      this.utils.send_pixel(
        media_track_endpoint+'/prd/buy',
        options, 'script'
      );
    },
    // refund: function(){
    // }
  })
